name: Cilex
tagline: A command-line micro-framework for PHP, inspired by Silex
body:
[Cilex](https://github.com/Cilex/Cilex) aims to provide a lightweight framework for creating PHP CLI scripts.
It is inspired by the [Silex](https://github.com/fabpot/Silex) microframework for web applications.

Just like Silex, Cilex also ties together various [Symfony2 components](https://github.com/symfony) as well as the [Pimple Dependency Injection Container](https://github.com/fabpot/pimple).

    For those wondering, "Cilex" is pronounced "C-lex", while "Silex" is pronounced "S-i-lex".
